entries.tooltip_check_show_inventory: This option will allow you to see your normal equipped items. While in this mode, you can drag and drop items from your inventory to equip/unequip items on your character.
entries.tooltip_check_hide_appearance: This option hides the current target's appearance items. This allows you to see what armor they are truly wearing.
entries.cybernetics_error: Cybernetics must be removed by a Cybernetic Specialist.
